name: Emotional Freedom Exercises
description: Techniques for rewiring emotional responses and reinforcing personal sovereignty.

cards.title: Breaking Trauma Bonds
cards.description: Dismantling the psychological and biochemical dependencies formed through narcissistic abuse.
cards.bulletpoints: Understanding Trauma Bonding, Dopamine Detox, Cognitive Reframing

cards.title: Reclaiming the Emotional Self
cards.description: Exercises to reconnect with authentic emotions and develop emotional sovereignty.
cards.bulletpoints: Journaling for Emotional Clarity, Emotional Regulation Drills, Developing Emotional Independence

cards.title: Rewiring Thought Patterns
cards.description: Techniques to disrupt negative self-talk and reprogram limiting beliefs installed by narcissists.
cards.bulletpoints: Interrupting Self-Sabotage, Neural Reconditioning, Affirmation Rebuilding
